CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: 42 Thus , it is desirable to attach electron - withdrawing groups such as ketone or ester groups and fluorine atoms.

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
|--------------|
| ketone groups |
| ester groups |
| fluorine atoms |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
|--------------|
| ketone groups |
| ester groups |
| fluorine atoms |

(Note: In this context, "groups" refer to specific chemical structures or functionalities attached to a larger molecule, so they are considered material names.)

Paragraph: 42 Thus , it is desirable to attach electron - withdrawing groups such as ketone or ester groups and fluorine atoms.

Let's think step by step.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| electron-withdrawing groups |
| ketone groups |
| ester groups |
| fluorine atoms |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| electron-withdrawing groups |
| ketone groups |
| ester groups |
| fluorine atoms |

Note: In this context, "desirable" and "it is desirable" do not refer to material properties and have been removed.

Paragraph: 42 Thus , it is desirable to attach electron - withdrawing groups such as ketone or ester groups and fluorine atoms.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Value of material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

| fluorine atoms |

Explanation: The paragraph discusses the attachment of certain groups (electron-withdrawing groups, specifically ketone or ester groups and fluorine atoms) to a molecule. These entities can be considered material properties as they describe specific chemical structures or functional groups that can influence the behavior and properties of a material.
